channel.title: Google on Shared thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Shared thoughts

item.title: TIL how to (re)enable syncing your shared google calendars
item.description: Today i opened my Calendar app on OS X and all my coworkers shared calendars had vanished… And there’s no option to re-enable them from within the app itself. After a short investigation I found this link: https://calendar.google.com/calendar/syncselect Just go there and tick all calendars you want to sync.
